title: Halloween: The Boogyman's Legacy
description:
Project Summary-

This fan edit combines Halloween, Halloween II, Halloween H20, and the opening scenes of Halloween Resurrection into one extended film, with new music, and an incredible ending for you to witness. The reason for combining these films is for the editors own liking, and to give the viewer a look at the story behind Michael Myers and Laurie Strode in one 4 hours feature. This edition will bring you the story of Michael like you&#039;ve never seen before!

Status........... Complete
